name: Mecha Escape
description:
This is another dumb little thing I made for my Game Design class in college, so it's still not gonna too noteworthy. Feedback is still appreciated though.

AGAIN; I ONLY OWN THE GIRL WITH GLASSES AND THE YELLOW SHIRT IN THE GMOD SCREENSHOTS!! EVERYTHING ELSE BELONGS TO EITHER VALVE THEMSELVES, OR THE CORRESPONDING CREATOR ON THE STEAM WORKSHOP!!
